content.rendered:
About Sifu Och Wing Chun: Exclusive Insight into Ip Man Wing Chun Kung Fu

We really love what we do, and our chief instructor, Sifu Och, has been doing martial arts for almost 30 years. It is his strongly held belief that Wing Chun Kung Fu is one of the most relevant, practical forms of self defense throughout the martial arts. To truly learn necessary essential training, it must be coupled with persistence, practice and dedication.  This is why we don’t play the “points” game or practice fancy movements, jump kicks,etc. Wing Chun Kung Fu is a down to earth and devastating system of self defense when practiced efficiently.  Our goal is to hone your skills until you are fully able to use what you learn here in real-world situations.

We hope that you never have to get into a fight, and that you can avoid one at all costs. That said, if a fight is put upon you, we want you to be able to end it quickly and protect your loved ones. If you want to understand who we are and what makes Sifu Och Wing Chun tick, it’s our dedication to our craft.

2 WEEK FREE TRIAL & Access to our full schedule

Fill out the form below to get 2 FREE weeks of training at our downtown lakeland facility and access to our full class schedule!

Our Sense of Lineage and Dedication

Appointed the World Ving Tsun Athletic Association Regional Director for all of the Southeastern U.S.A., Chief instructor Sifu Justin Och has the only Florida school certified to teach the entire Ip Man system under four direct lineages. He has personal traveled to over 14+ countries seeking out Wing Chun Kung Fu Masters. Sifu Justin Och has been certified as a Wing Chun Black and Gold Sash instructor 3 times independently and is a 5th Degree Master Sifu.

We’re more than a martial arts studio, we’re a community! It’s important to everyone here at Sifu Och Wing Chun to support all levels of students and help each other grow to our greatest potential! No matter if you’re just walking through the door or have been with us for years, you’re a part of the Sifu Och Wing Chun family!

Join Now with A 2 Week Trial

Our Chief Instructor: Sifu Justin Och

From the attention and honor we give to our lineage and the history of Ip Man Wing Chun Kung Fu, Sifu Och Wing Chun Kung Fu is a place dedicated to the combat behind the Ip Man lineage. Training and increasing the understanding of powerful, relevant self-defense skills for the modern age.

Sifu Och Wing Chun teaches you what you need without the fluff. Increasing your confidence while keeping your loved ones safe in a family environment filled with people who care about each other. The individuals here will aid you regardless of whether your goal is to learn Wing Chun, develop self defense skills, or get in shape. Our theory of self defense, discipline, and personal training are the same—what you put into your training you get out of it.

Read More About Sifu Och

Meet our instructors

Learn more about Sifu Och Wing Chun and our dedicated team of instructors, coaches, and advanced level students. Click on their image to read their bio and see what they have to say about their experience with wing chun kung fu.

We Care for Your Whole Family!

We have group classes for adults six days a week.  Our After-school pickup program expanded in 2012, teaming up with the Just Dance Studios in Lakeland to give kids kung fu, kids kickboxing, hip hop, language classes, ballroom, fine arts classes, and much more. Whether it’s our after-school program, summer camps, kids martial arts, or holiday day camps, this powerhouse of instructors and teachers provide top-rated care and exciting opportunities for kids of all ages!

About Sifu Och & Just Dance

Just Dance allows us to add programs like culinary classes, foreign language classes, dance lessons, and more to our martial arts, kid kickboxing, and wing chun kung fu program—all in all, your kids will learn all sorts of skills and be kept engaged and active. All of our instructors are carefully screened, and teachers go through background checks and are trained to care for your children and provide a safe and healthy environment.

Learn More About Sifu Och and Wing Chun

We know that if you come train with us you’ll learn valuable skills that you’ll hold onto your entire life. Master Sifu Justin Och is the only one in the state of Florida who is Certified and Tested to train people in the Full Ip Man System.  The full system includes training and certification under all the lineages of Ip Chun, Ip Ching, Simon Lau and Moy Yat.  He has traveled and trained in over 10 countries across the World in the Wing Chun Kung Fu system.

Learn more about Sifu Och Wing Chun:

  • Sifu Justin Och Biography
  • Wing Chun History

All you need to do is take the first step and contact us. Start your training today—and we’ll help and encourage you every step of the way.

Check Out What Our Community Has to Offer!

We focus on real-world results while encouraging kids, adults, families, and individuals through both group and private lessons. Dedicated students interested in learning the entire system of Wing Chun Kung Fu, self defense, cardio kickboxing, kids martial arts, after school pickup programs, and no-gi Jiujitsu are welcome to join any one of our many programs. We are one big martial arts family—training, socializing, and making friends of all ages.

Start now by signing up to our two week training trial with the form below!
